$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Add.caption: Add Books
$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Add.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Add Books
$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Add.text:
\define thisSeriesSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='series' default='None'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/SeriesTitles]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisSeriesSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisGenreSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='genre' default='None'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookGenres]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisGenreSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisAuthorSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='author' default='None'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookAuthors]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisAuthorSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisLocationSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='location' default='None'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookLocations]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisLocationSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisTagSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/state/booktag' field='selected_tag'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookTags]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisTagSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisOwnerSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='owner' default='None'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookOwners]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisOwnerSearch)$]]'> \end \define thisTypeSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' field='item_type'> <$list filter='[[$:/data/BookTypes]indexes[]sort[title]regexp:[(?i)$(thisTypeSearch)$]]'> \end Adding Items: Type: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add type' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisTypeSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_type_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_type_select' placeholder='Narrow Type List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add type' setTo='new'>New Item Type) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add type' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_type' placeholder='Item Type'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookTypes' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!book_type}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='book_author' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add type' setTo='notnew'> Done
Title: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_title' class='tc-edit-texteditor' placeholder='Book Title'/> <$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_author'> Author: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add author' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisAuthorSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_author_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_author_select' placeholder='Narrow Author List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add author' setTo='new'>New Author) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add author' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_author' placeholder='Author'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookAuthors' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!book_author}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='book_author' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add author' setTo='notnew'> Done
<$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_series'> Series: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add series' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisSeriesSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_series_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_series_select' placeholder='Narrow Series List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add series' setTo='new'>New Series) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add series' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_series' placeholder='Series Title'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/SeriesTitles' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!book_series}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='book_series' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add series' setTo='notnew'> Done
<$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_genre'> Genre: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add genre' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisGenreSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_genre_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_genre_select' placeholder='Narrow Genre List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add genre' setTo='new'>New Genre) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add genre' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_genre' placeholder='Genre'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookGenres' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!book_genre}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='book_genre' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add genre' setTo='notnew'> Done
<$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_location'> Location: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add location' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisLocationSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_location_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_location_select' placeholder='Narrow Location List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add location' setTo='new'>New Location) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add location' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='book_location' placeholder='Location'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookLocations' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!book_location}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='book_location' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add location' setTo='notnew'> Done
<$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_owner'> Owner: <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add owner' type=nomatch text='new'> <$set name=thisOwnerSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_owner_select}}> <> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_owner_select' placeholder='Narrow Owner List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add owner' setTo='new'>New Owner) <$reveal state='$:/state/Library Tracker/add owner' type=match text='new'> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='owner' placeholder='Owner'/> <$button> Add <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookOwners' $index={{$:/state/newbook!!owner}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' $field='owner' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/Library Tracker/add owner' setTo='notnew'> Done <$reveal type=nomatch text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_tags'> Tags (it will always be tagged with `Book` by default):
<$reveal type=match state='$:/state/newbook!!add_or_create_tag' text='create'> New Tag: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/booktag' field='tag_temp' placeholder='New Tag'/> <$button> Create Tag <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/BookTags' $index={{$:/state/booktag!!tag_temp}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/booktag' $field='tag_temp' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/newbook!!add_or_create_tag' setTo='nocreate'> Done
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/newbook!!add_or_create_tag' text='create'> Tag to add: <$set name=thisTagSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!narrow_tag_select}}> <> <$fieldmangler tiddler='$:/temp/newbook'> <$button> Add Tag <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-add-tag' $param={{$:/state/booktag!!selected_tag}}/> <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='narrow_tag_select' placeholder='Narrow Tag List'/> (<$button set='$:/state/newbook!!add_or_create_tag' setTo='create'>New Tag)
List of current tags:
<$fieldmangler tiddler='$:/temp/newbook'> <$list filter='[[$:/temp/newbook]tags[]]'> <$view field='title'/> <$button> Remove Tag <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-remove-tag' $param=<>/>
<$fieldmangler tiddler={{$:/state/newbook!!book_title}}> <$button> Add Book <$reveal type=match text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_author'> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' author=''/> <$reveal type=match text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_series'> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' series=''/> <$reveal type=match text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_genre'> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' genre=''/> <$reveal type=match text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_location'> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' location=''/> <$reveal type=match text=false state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_owner'> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' owner=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' title={{$:/state/newbook!!book_title}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-add-tag' $param='Book'/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/newbook' book_title=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/newbook' tags=''/>

Settings]!show_genre[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_series[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_author[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_genre[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_series[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_location[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_type[false]]'> <$list filter='[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings]!show_owner[false]]'> \end If you select an author/series/location/genre from the drop down menu, then change the `Sort by` option you will have to select from the second dropdown menu again to get it to display things. Despite it showing `all` when you change the sort by option it keeps the previous value, which is invalid now. If I can get a select widget to active action widgets, or to change multiple fields at the same time than I can fix this. If you click on the location of a book it will allow you to change the books location. |Sort by |<>|<>| |Search by |<>|<$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/newbook' field='search_text' placeholder='Search'/>| <$set name=sortType value={{$:/state/newbook!!sort}}> <$set name=searchField value={{$:/state/newbook!!search_in}}> <$set name=thisSearch value={{$:/state/newbook!!search_text}}> <$set name=SelectedType value={{$:/state/newbook!!selected_type}}> <$set name=SelectedFilterPart value=<>> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/newbook!!selected_type' text=''> Number of matching books: <> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_type' text=false tag=th> Type <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_author' text=false tag=th> Author <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_location' text=false tag=th> Location <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_owner' text=false tag=th> Owner <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_series' text=false tag=th> Series <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!show_genre' text=false tag=th> Genre <>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Libr.caption: Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Libr.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Libr.text:
\define thisRemoveAuthor() Select Author: <$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='edit_author_list'><$list filter='[[$:/data/BookAuthors]indexes[]]'> <$button set='$:/data/BookAuthors##$(AuthorToRemove)$'>Remove Author \end \define thisRemoveSeries() Select Series: <$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='edit_series_list'><$list filter='[[$:/data/SeriesTitles]indexes[]]'> <$button set='$:/data/SeriesTitles##$(SeriesToRemove)$'>Remove Series \end \define thisRemoveGenre() Select Genre: <$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='edit_genre_list'><$list filter='[[$:/data/BookGenres]indexes[]]'> <$button set='$:/data/BookGenres##$(GenreToRemove)$'>Remove Genre \end \define thisRemoveLocation() Select Location: <$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='edit_location_list'><$list filter='[[$:/data/BookLocations]indexes[]]'> <$button set='$:/data/BookLocations##$(LocationToRemove)$'>Remove Location \end \define thisRemoveTag() Select Tag: <$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='edit_tag_list'><$list filter='[[$:/data/BookTags]indexes[]]'> <$button set='$:/data/BookTags##$(TagToRemove)$'>Remove Tag \end <$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_type' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Item Type
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_author' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Author
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_series' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Series
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_genre' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Genre
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_location' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Location
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_owner' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Owner
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings' field='show_tags' checked=true unchecked=false>Show Tags
!!Edit Author List <$set name=AuthorToRemove value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!edit_author_list}}> <> !!Edit Series List <$set name=SeriesToRemove value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!edit_series_list}}> <> !!Edit Genre List <$set name=GenreToRemove value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!edit_genre_list}}> <> !!Edit Location List <$set name=LocationToRemove value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!edit_location_list}}> <> !!Edit Tag List <$set name=TagToRemove value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/LibraryTracker/Library Tracker Settings!!edit_tag_list}}> <>
